Class SkeletalType

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor

game.actors.enemies.skeletal.SkeletalType
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Resettable, RuneSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
HeavySkeletalSwordsman, SkeletalBandit
public abstract class SkeletalType
extends Enemy
Abstract class representing a physical SkeletalType enemy in the game world.

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()

      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found
